instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-000165 not charge
threads.message:
hi guis 
I have this card that doesn't want to charge the battery. no green or orange LEDs. Where can I start?

threads.title: 820-000165 not charge
threads.message:
You must get first the amber light on Magsafe, no other way to charge the battery.

Any history available?
Audio works good?
Did you try another LIO board/flex?
Inspect J9500 pins under microscope.

threads.title: 820-000165 not charge
threads.message:
i tried with 2 magsafe but nothing. No led
With another battery it starts and works. With magsafe inserted I see the charge symbol but no led.

threads.title: 820-000165 not charge
threads.message:
"Audio works good?"
Please respond to all questions...

Also test for activity at left USB port.

threads.title: 820-000165 not charge
threads.message:
No audio and USB port not work 


[ATTACH type="full"]60142[/ATTACH]

threads.title: 820-000165 not charge
threads.message:
In this case, 3V42_G3H doesn't arrive to LIO board.
Bad LIO flex/board, or J9500 contacts.

"Inspect J9500 pins under microscope."
Take your time...
